title: La Canfora: Jets a sleeper, Redskins breakdown, Hard Knocks recap (Football 08/15)
description:
Will Brinson breaks down the second episode of "Hard Knocks" and discusses the latest news and notes around the NFL before being joined by CBS Sports NFL Insider Jason La Canfora, who is buying stock in the New York Jets, a team he thinks can be a sleeper in the 2018 NFL season with Sam Darnold under center. JLC also talks about the Redskins disappointment with the Derrius Guice injury, if he's in on the Ravens yet and much, much more.
